heading: Seven New Legendary Aspects with Diablo 4 Season 1!
content: With the arrival of  Patch 1.1.0. for Season 1, we have 7 new to hunt down! There is one new for each class, along with two general use . Get your characters ready to grind away for these items. With this absolute massive patch coming, the game as we know it is going to shift quite a bit! The will be breaking down all parts of this patch down into Seasonal Guides in our Resources menu, (with season release), updated , and more that you have come to expect from us. Some of these guides may take a little more time than others due to the tight window of the content being released, but rest assured we are working around the clock to get this out to you. With that said, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 1 experience! Written by: Reviewed by:
